prompt: Figure out how much it would cost to get two 'Carne Asada Burritos' and one 'Chips & Guac' from 'Taco Temple' delivered. Then, draft an email to finance.dept@mycompany.co with the subject 'Lunch Expense Estimate' and state the total cost. Do not place the order.

Find me a round-trip flight on FlyUnified from Boston (BOS) to Dublin (DUB) that arrives at least one day before a tech summit that starts on August 10th and leaves the day after it ends on August 13th. Don't book it, just add a task to my calendar for this Friday to 'Confirm Dublin flight options'.

My colleague's flight, FlyUnified FU789 from Chicago (ORD) to San Diego (SAN), is scheduled for the 10th of August. Can you find its scheduled arrival time and then create an event on my calendar to 'Leave for airport to pick up Maya' that is set for 90 minutes before the flight's arrival?

Find the cheapest one-way, non-stop flight from Seattle (SEA) to London (LHR) departing anytime in the first week of August. Email the flight details, including the price and flight number, to my travel agent at 'firstclass.travel@gomail.com' to get her opinion.

My team is considering two locations for our offsite in September: London or Berlin. Then, find the cheapest round-trip flight from DEN to Berlin (BER) for the same dates. For both cities, find a well-rated StaynB that can host 4 people for that week. Finally, email a summary to offsite-planning@mycompany.com with the subject 'Offsite Cost Comparison' and list the total cost (flight + 7 nights of lodging) for each city.

Please arrange travel for our client, Dr. Anya Sharma. Find a business class flight on FlyUnified from San Francisco (SFO) to Tokyo (NRT) arriving on or before March 10th next year and returning March 17th. Then, identify a different 5-star StaynB "Luxe" properties in the Osaka district available for March 10-17. Draft an email to 'anya.sharma@clientcorp.com' with the subject 'Travel Proposal: Tokyo Meeting', presenting the flight details and providing the links and nightly rates for the three lodging options for her review.

I need to book my solo trip to Iceland. First, book the cheapest non-stop, one-way flight from New York (JFK) to Reykjavik (KEF) for October 25th. Based on the flight's arrival date, book a StaynB for 3 nights for one person in the 'Mi√∞borg' area with a kitchenette. Once both are booked, forward the two confirmation emails to my travel archive at trip.archive@gomail.com with the subject 'Iceland Logistics Confirmed'.

I need to upgrade my home office. Find three different ergonomic office chairs on Omnizon, all under $350 and with good lumbar support. Compile the names and product links of these three chairs into an email to my financial advisor (f.advisor@consult.com) for review. Also, block out one hour on my calendar next Tuesday afternoon to 'Make final office chair purchase decision'.

Search for two highly-rated Italian restaurants that have availability for a party of 4 this Saturday evening. Email the names and booking links of the two options to my executive assistant at 'alex.chen@gomail.com' so they can make the final choice. Also, put a placeholder on my calendar for Saturday at 8 PM named 'Potential Dinner Engagement'.

I need to organize a farewell dinner for a colleague. Find and reserve a table for 10 people at a seafood restaurant for the second Friday of next month. It must have outdoor seating. Once booked, create a calendar event for it and send an email to 'hr.events@gomail.com' with the subject 'Farewell Dinner for Mark' and include the reservation confirmation.

First, block out my calendar for this Thursday from 1 PM to 2:30 PM for a 'Strategy Lunch'. Then, find a quiet cafe or bistro with reservations available during that time. Book a table for two. Finally, send a quick email to 'beatrice.lim@gomail.com' saying 'Lunch is set for Thursday! See you then.'

Find the two cheapest 3-bedroom rental homes in Austin, TX on Zilloft. Then, compose an email to myself at my.personal.email@gomail.com with the subject 'Rental Comparison'. In the body, list both property addresses and their monthly prices. Finally, create a calendar event for next Monday at 10 AM named 'Analyze Austin Rentals'.

I'm thinking about a trip to Maryland for President's Day weekend, from February 14th to the 17th. Can you find me a Marrisuite hotel that has rooms with a balcony? Don't book anything yet, just put a 1-hour hold on my calendar for this Thursday at 4 PM to 'Finalize Hotel'.

Please secure an Executive Suite at the Marrisuite in London, UK, for my business trip from July 22nd to July 26th. After confirming the booking, add a task to my calendar for July 29th titled 'Submit London Trip Expense Report'.

Find me three different noise-cancelling headphones on Omnizon, all under $250 and with at least a 4.5-star rating. Create a calendar event for this Saturday at 2 PM called 'Decide on Headphones' and put the links to the three options in the event description.

Find a reservation for two at a highly-rated sushi shop for tomorrow evening. Book it, then create a calendar event for it. In the calendar event's notes, please add the restaurant's full address and the reservation confirmation ID.

My plans for Saturday night just got cancelled. My evening is free from 7 PM onwards. Find me a table for one at any sushi restaurant in downtown Austin with at least 4.5 stars and book it. Then, block off a 90-minute slot on my calendar for 'Solo Sushi Night' starting at whatever time you booked.

My friend and I are thinking of a ski trip to Whistler, BC. Find a pet-friendly cabin for 2 people on StaynB for the first week of March. Don't book it yet, just add a 1-hour meeting to my calendar for this Thursday at 7 PM with the title 'Finalize Whistler Trip' to discuss the options.

I need to plan a work retreat for my team in Miami, Florida for late January. Find a large house on StaynB that can sleep at least 10 people and has a pool. Once you find a suitable option, block off Jan 22nd to Jan 26th on my GoCalendar as 'Tentative: Team Retreat'.
